name: Mark Your Territory!
description:
In this 2-d Platformer, claim as many platforms as possible before time runs out! It is your objective, to leave no stone unturned, tag all of the platforms to win!! Features:
  • Double Jump
  • Multiple Platform color changes
  • Counter for Platforms Tagged
  • Multiple platforms to explore and tag
Rules:
  • Each time Player falls ,  level restarts
  • If the player fails to tag all of the platforms before time runs out,  level restarts
Directions:
  • Jump: Space bar, or up key
  • Double Jump: press twice on Spacebar, or up key
  • moving forwards: --> right key
  • moving backwards: <-- left key
Player spawns on the first platform, working there way around the course, needing to tag each platform once, to be counted as a territory being marked.
